| bitCRM                 | How to Create and Connect WhatsApp Cloud API                            | Getting Started                      | <p id="">If you are ready to start working with the "WhatsApp Cloud API" and boost your business potential, here is a guide on how to integrate a number into your WhatsApp account. Please remember to check the <strong id="">"Requirements section"</strong> so you can follow the process smoothly.</p><h2 id="">Requirements Before You Start the Process</h2><ul id=""><li id=""><strong id="">Verified Meta Business Manager (Business Verification)<br></strong> Your business must be verified by Meta with legal documents.<br><br></li><li id=""><strong id="">Admin Access to Meta Business Manager<br> </strong>You must have full control access in your Business Manager account.<br><br></li><li id=""><strong id="">A Phone Number (Clean &amp;
